Message: The user completes the submission of the form
i have an active ad running but i'm not getting any data

Hi Rob, I'm sorry to hear that you're not getting any data on your active ad. Could you please let me know which tracking platform or service you are using for your ad? This will help me provide more specific guidance.

Thanks for the information, Rob. To troubleshoot your issue with not getting any data from your active ad on NewsBreak Ad Manager, I recommend checking the following steps:
1. Ensure that your tracking setup is correctly configured.
2. Verify that event tracking is properly implemented, as it's essential for optimization and ensuring our backend algorithm performs efficiently.
3. Review the Account Management Guide to ensure everything is set up correctly on your end.
You can refer to this detailed guide for managing your account: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
If you continue to experience issues, please let me know, and I can assist you further.
It should all be setup correctly, I have had other ads that worked fine.

Got it, Rob. Since your previous ads worked fine, let's focus on troubleshooting the current setup. Here are a few steps you can follow to ensure everything is working correctly:
1. **Check Pixel Implementation**: Make sure the pixel code is correctly placed on your landing page and event page.
2. **Simulate the Event**: Perform the action that should trigger the pixel (e.g., simulate a purchase if it's a complete_payment event) to see if it fires correctly.
3. **Verify in Shopify**: If you're using Shopify, ensure that the customer event is correctly configured and test it in both Shopify and NewsBreak.
For more detailed steps, you can refer to this guide: [Event Tracking Debugging Steps](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/34801428495373-How-to-integrate-with-Digistore24).
If you've tried these steps and still face issues, please contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
everything is setup correctly unless you changed something since my last ad was running

Thanks for confirming, Rob. If everything is set up correctly and you suspect there might have been changes since your last ad, I recommend checking the latest guidelines and updates on our tracking setup. Here are a few things to verify:
1. **Event Management**: Ensure that your conversion tracking is active by going to 'Tools' and accessing the Event Management tab.
2. **Pixel or Postback**: Confirm that your Pixel or Postback is correctly set up and firing events as expected.
3. **Test Your Setup**: Use the 'Go Test' feature in the Event Management tab to test your event setup.
For more detailed information, you can refer to this article: [Introduction to tCPA](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17827591199757-Introduction-to-tCPA).
If you still encounter issues, please reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for more hands-on support.
so, you are not going to look at my ad and see why it's not working?

I understand your frustration, Rob. Unfortunately, I don't have the capability to directly access or review individual ads. However, our support team can help with that. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the details of your ad issue, and they will be able to look into it for you. Make sure to include your ad ID and any relevant information about the setup so they can assist you more efficiently.
